name: BGC Workload Management System
description: Created for BGC Engineering, this project was designed as a resource management tool for the project management team
tools: Built with Spring Boot, Maven, and ChartJS. Deployed to Heroku

name: UBC Course Explorer
description: An application built that aims to provide an one-stop interface for UBC students to find course information, including professor ratings, grade distribution, and nested prerequisite courses, in hopes of helping them better plan out their study path throughout university.
flavourtext: Centralized course information for UBC students
tools: Built using Django, and a variety of APIs

name: Best By
description: A mobile application that allows users to manage their food inventory. Comes with a variety of features, such as expiration date notifiers, ingredient categorization, and recipe suggestions
flavourtext: Mobile food-management system with recipe suggestions and more

name: Personal Portfolio
description: My own personal website, which was designed with the intent of being a creative outlet for myself. It was also built using various different technologies that I am learning and using to this day.
flavourtext: My personal website built using React
